name: 7 Species of Trahv
description:
I tried to make this for the Godot Wild Jam #32. The theme "seven" was hard for me to work with and it took a couple days before I settled on something.  The idea is that you are managing a nature preserve with the last 7 species on the planet.  I currently only have 1.5 species (the .5 is the grass, which is nothing but a tile at the moment). For whatever reason I decided to try 3d for the first time as well as multiple interacting systems.  I never got passed making the "Nerfullo" creature AI for movement and reproduction. There is no way to interact with the game at this time.  I plan on revisiting this later as a learning project.  It was quite fun to try.  The other 5 creatures:
Trees, Birds, Rodents, Migrating-eaters, and a narrative surprise for the 7th.
